allow: Bash(python3 -c " import json with open\(''AIRO_Competitor_Analysis v3 comprehensive - sentiment.ipynb'', ''r''\) as f: nb = json.load\(f\) # Extract markdown cells with section headers for i, cell in enumerate\(nb[''cells'']\): if cell.get\(''cell_type''\) == ''markdown'': source = ''''.join\(cell.get\(''source'', []\)\) if ''##'' in source or ''objective'' in source.lower\(\): print\(f''Cell {i}: {source[:200]}''\) print\(''---''\) ")
Bash(..venvScriptspython.exe -c "import nltk; nltk.download\(''punkt_tab''\); print\(''punkt_tab downloaded successfully''\)")
